thread.title: 'Star Wars Battlefront' beta launches next month
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars Battlefront' beta launches next month

title: 'Star Wars Battlefront' beta launches next month
text:
Screenshot of Star Wars Battlefront: (Photo: 2015 Electronic Arts Inc.)
13 CONNECT 65 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Video game players will get their first taste of combat on the ice planet Hoth next month.
Publisher Electronic Arts confirmed a beta test for the upcoming video game Star Wars Battlefront will arrive in early October.
According to a statement published Tuesday from EA and game developer DICE, the beta will feature a 40-player multiplayer battle called Walker Assault, which takes place on the planet Hoth. It also features a Survival Mode based on Tatooine, where one player works with a teammate to fend off Imperial troops.
DICE says a new mode called Drop Zone will be included, but no details on the mode were revealed.
The game will launch on November 17 for PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.
USA TODAY
Video: 'Star Wars: Battlefront' takes to skies
Follow Brett Molina on Twitter: @brettmolina23 .
